biography: Kristian, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, is known for his composed demeanor and strategic approach to the game. Representing Master Golf Club, Kristian brings a level of thoughtfulness to the course that is admired by his peers. He has been seen at the tournament 3 times.

While the coveted Hector Trophée and the Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Kristian's dedication and sportsmanship are evident each time he competes. He is a player who values the spirit of the game and the camaraderie of the event.
Although Kristian is not expected to participate in Hector Trophée 2025, golf enthusiasts know that surprises can happen and last-minute changes to the field are always possible.
